document_data.name: Temple of the Cult of the Dragon
document_data.mainbody: The '''Temple of the Cult of the Dragon''' was a secret location used by the [[Cult of the Dragon]] found in the city of [[Urmlaspyr]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The temple was run by High Dragonservant [[Faerlaur Onthim]]. He was assisted by six other priests and thirteen followers.
